instruction: Describe how digital marketing can be used to improve customer engagement.
output: Digital marketing can be used to build relationships with customers by providing them with personalized content and engaging them with promotions and offers that are tailored to their interests. Additionally, digital marketing can be used to improve customer satisfaction by responding to inquiries quickly, connecting with customers through social media, and providing the right information at the right time. Furthermore, digital marketing can help to build customer loyalty through incentives and rewards, as well as providing exceptional customer service.
